sentences.english: Marissa cruised through Dannerville's second light and continued toward the coast.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽莎驾车通过丹维尔的第二个红绿灯，朝海岸开去。

sentences.english: Keep going along Chang An Road and turn left at the first traffic lights.
sentences.chinese: 沿着长安路笔直走，到第一个红绿灯后左转。

sentences.english: These lights flickered continuously like traffic light which have gone mad.
sentences.chinese: 灯泡一刻一停地闪烁着，就像失去了控制的红绿灯。

sentences.english: Some cities have even switched off their traffic lights.
sentences.chinese: 有些城市甚至连红绿灯也关了。

sentences.english: In our country, those crossings often use fixed Cyc red and green light.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段，这些路口大多使用周期固定的红绿灯控制器。

sentences.english: Straight ahead at the lights, then turn right.
sentences.chinese: 直走到红绿灯，然后右拐。

sentences.english: B：Yes, then, at the traffic light, turn right onto Ocean Road.
sentences.chinese: 是的，然后在红绿灯向右转向海洋大道。

sentences.english: When you get to a traffic light with Jiuxianqiao road, you will turn left.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的红绿灯位于酒仙桥路，左转。

sentences.english: Then walk two blocks to the traffic light. Make another left to Wooster.
sentences.chinese: 接着走过两条街到红绿灯，再左转就到沃斯特街了。

sentences.english: I like traffic lights. But only when they're green.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢红绿灯，当然只有它是绿色的时候。

sentences.english: After that, u will make a left-hand turn at the first traffic light.
sentences.chinese: 然后，在第一个红绿灯时往左拐。

sentences.english: After that, you make a left-hand turn at the first traffic light.
sentences.chinese: 然后，在第一个红绿灯时往左拐。

sentences.english: Go along North Street to the traffic lights and turn right.
sentences.chinese: 沿着北街一直走到这红绿灯处后往右转。

sentences.english: Go straight ahead to the trafic lights and then turn left.
sentences.chinese: 一直往前走，走到红绿灯然后再左转。

sentences.english: Go straight ahead to the traffic lights and then turn left。
sentences.chinese: 笔直往前走，走到红绿灯的地方左拐。

sentences.english: The German city of Augsburg recently installed traffic lights in the ground in front of two train stations.
sentences.chinese: 德国奥格斯堡近期在两个火车站前的地面装设红绿灯。

definition: to go straight/straight forward/fig. to do right
to run a red light/failing to stop at a red traffic light/(slang) to have sex with a girl while she is menstruating
